name: Bulbasaur
imageDescription: A green Pokémon with a bud on its back
description: This grass type Pokémon has a bud on its back. It is half plant and half animal.

name: Ditto
description: This formless Pokémon has the unique ability to transform itself into other Pokémon species, mimicking their appearance and abilities.

name: Snorlax
imageDescription: A giant blue Pokémon with big yellow tummy.
description: This Pokémon likes naps in the middle of the day (and middle of the road). Despite it's laziness, its bulk makes it a formidable opponent in battle.

name: Charmander
imageDescription: An orange bipedal Pokémon with a flame on the tip of its tail.
description: This fire type Pokémon is unique for its undying flame at the tip of its tail. It is said that this Pokémon will die if its flame is to ever go out.

name: Pikachu
imageDescription: A yellow Pokémon with rosy cheeks, long pointy ears, and a bolt-shaped tail.
description: This electric Pokémon might have a cute appearance, but it can discharge potent electric shocks. It is a very popular Pokémon.

name: Eevee
imageDescription: A brown quadruped Pokémon with pointy ears, big eyes, and a fluffy collar and tail.
description: This Pokémon has largely been domesticated and rarely found in the wild. Its evolutionary path is very diverse, making it a very popular choice for trainers.

name: Lapras
imageDescription: A blue Pokémon with a long neck, a large gray shell on its back, and four flippers.
description: This rare water type Pokémon was nearly hunted to extinction. It can be used as a ferry across open waters but its docile nature make for an easy prey for poachers.

name: Squirtle
imageDescription: A blue Pokémon with large eyes, a round head, shell, and tail.
description: This Pokémon resembles a turtle. It can withdraw into its hard shell for protection and attack by spraying water from its mouth with amazing accuracy.

name: Jigglypuff
imageDescription: A pink balloon-like Pokémon with pointy ears, stubby limbs, and a pair of big cute round eyes.
description: Despite its adorable appearance, this Pokémon is known to put its foes to sleep with its soothing lullaby.

name: Cubone
imageDescription: A bipedal Pokémon wearing a skull on its face and holding a bone as weapon.
description: This is also known as the Lonely Pokémon as avoids social interaction. It wears its mother's skull as helmet and constantly mourns for her passing.
